channel.title: RSC client help
channel.description: have not played on any rsc servers for almost a year now and want to get back into it. but when i try to run the clients they all say java is not a recognized command etc. i do not remember how to fix it so if some one could help i would appreciate it. thanks

item.title: RSC client help
item.dc:creator: @marty marty
item.description:
@marty wrote:

when i used the program that you suggested and i hit apply to apply the new path it gives me an error
Error changing environment Variable “path”
requested registry access is not allowed

**Fixed the problem just ran as admin thanks for the help with my problem!!

Read full topic

item.title: RSC client help
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

marty:

have not played on any rsc servers for almost a year now and want to get back into it. but when i try to run the clients they all say java is not a recognized command etc. i do not remember how to fix it so if some one could help i would appreciate it. thanks

Maybe your environment variables are not set, so reinstalling java should fix it or using this tool http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,394071.0.html

Check if you have ant installed with PATH set.

Also check your .bat files so their are right (some have different version of java that the one you got).

Read full topic

item.title: RSC client help
item.dc:creator: @marty marty
item.description:
@marty wrote:

I have java installed and it is updated to the newest one.

Read full topic
